teiHeader.fileDesc:
Quaestiones Naturales Machine readable text Plutarch Gregorius N. Bernardakis&responsibility;&fund.NEH; &Perseus.publish;
Plutarch Moralia Gregorius N. Bernardakis
Leipzig Teubner 1893
5

div1.p: dia\ ti/ to\ qala/ttion u)/dwr ou) tre/fei ta\ de/ndra;

po/teron di' h)
 ai)ti/an ou=de\ tw=n zw)|wn ta\ xersai=a; zw=|on ga e)/ggeion to\ futo
 ei)=nai, oi( peri\ *pla/twna kai\ *)anacago/ran kai\ *dhmo/kriton oi)/ontai: ou) ga dio/ti toi=s e)nali/ois futoi=s tro/fimo/n e)sti kai\ po/timon w(/sper toi=s i)xqu/sin, h)/dh kai\ ta\ e)n th=| xe/rsw| futa/ te kai\ de/ndra tre/fei: ou)/te ga e)ndu/etai tai=s r(i/zais u(po\ pa/xous ou)/t' a)nafe/retai u(po\ ba/rous: o(/ti d' e)mbriqe/s e)sti kai\ gew=des, a)/llois te polloi=s a)podei/knutai kai\ tw=| ma=llon a)ne/xein kai\ u(perei/dein ta\ ploi=a kai\ tou\s kolumbw=ntas: h)\ ma/lista me
 bla/ptetai chro/thti ta\ de/ndra chrantiko

de\ to\ qala/ttion; o(/qen pro/s ge ta\s sh/yeis oi(
a(/les bohqou=si, kai\ ta\ sw/mata tw=n lousame/nwn e)n qala/tth| chra
 eu)qu\s i)/sxei kai\ traxei=an th
 e)pifa/neian. h)\ to\ me
 e)/laion toi=s futoi=s pole/mion kai\ fqei/rei ta\ prosaleifo/mena; mete/xei de\ pollh=s h( qa/latta liparo/thtos: dio\ suneca/ptei, kai\ parainou=men ei)s ta\s flo/gas mh\ e)mba/llein qala/ttion u(/dwr. h)\ ge/gonen a)/poton kai\ pikro
 to\ u(/dwr, w(s *)aristote/lhs fhsi/n, a)nami/cei katakekaume/nhs gh=s;

kai\ ga h( koni/a gi/gnetai, gluke/os u(/datos ei)s te/fran e)mpeso/ntos, h( de\ dia/lusis e)ci/sthsi kai\ fqei/rei to\ xrhsto
 kai\ po/timon, w(s e)n h(mi=n oi( puretoi\ to\ u(gro
 ei)s xolh
 tre/pousin. a(\ d' i(storou=sin e)n th=| *)eruqra=| qala/ssh| blasta/nein u(lh/mata kai\ futa/, karpo
 me
 ou)de/na fe/rei tre/fetai de\ toi=s potamoi=s pollh
 e)mba/llousin i)lu/n: o(/qen ou) pro/sw th=s gh=s a)lla\ plhsi/on e)/xei th
 ge/nesin.
dia\ ti/ ma=llon u(po\ tw=n u(eti/wn h)\ tw=n e)pirru/twn u(da/twn ta\ de/ndra kai\ ta\ spe/rmata pe/fuke tre/fesqai;

po/teron, w(s *lai=tos e)/lege, th=| plhgh=| ta\ o)/mbria diista/nta th
 gh=n po/rous poiei= kai\ diadu/etai ma=llon ei)s th
 r(i/zan h)\ tou=to me
 ou)k a)lhqe/s, a)ll'
e)/laqe to
 *lai=ton o(/ti kai\ ta\ limnai=a futa/, tu/fh kai\ fle/ws kai\ qru/on, a)nauch= kai\ a)blasth= me/nei, mh\ genome/nwn o)/mbrwn kaq' w(/ran to\ de\ tou= *)aristote/lous a)lhqe/s, o(/ti pro/sfato/n e)sti kai\ ne/on u(/dwr to\ u(o/menon e(/wlon de\ kai\ palaio
 to\ limnai=on;
h)\ kai\ tou=to piqano
 ma=llon h)\ a)lhqe/s e)sti; ta\ ga phgai=a kai\ pota/mia na/mata pro/sfata me/n e)sti kai\ neogenh=: “potamoi=s ga di\s toi=s au)toi=s ou)k a)
 e)mbai/hs” w(/s fhsin *(hra/kleitos, e(/tera e)pirrei= u(/data tre/fei kai\ tau=ta tw=n xei=ron.
a)=r' ou)=n kou=fo/n e)sti to\ e)k *dio\s u(/dwr kai\ a)erw=des
kai\ pneu/mati memigme/non o(dhgei=tai te kai\ a)nape/mpetai taxe/ws ei)s to\ futo
 u(po\ lepto/thtos, dio\ kai\ pomfo/lugas poiei= th=| a)nami/cei tou= a)e/ros: h)\ tre/fei me
 ma/lista kratou/menon u(po\ tou= trefome/nou
( tou=to ga/r e)sti pe/yis: a)peyi/a de\ tou)nanti/on, o(/tan i)sxuro/tera tou= paqei=n kai\ metaba/llon ta\ lepta\ kai\ a(pla= kai\ a)/xuma ma=llon, oi(=o/n e)sti to\ o)/mbrion u(/dwr; gennw/menon ga e)n a)e/ri kai\ pneu/mati kaqaro
 kai\ a)mige\s ka/teisi: ta\ de\ phgai=a kai\
th=| gh=| kai\ toi=s to/pois o(moiou/mena, di' w(=n e)/ceisi, pollw=n a)napi/mplatai poioth/twn, di' a(\s h(=tto/n e)stin eu)/trepta kai\ bra/dion au(ta\ pare/xei th=| pe/yei metaba/llein ei)s to\ trefo/menon: tw=n d' o)mbri/wn to\ eu)/trepton ai( sh/yeis kathgorou=sin, eu)shpto/tera ga/r
e)sti tw=n potami/wn kai\ freatiai/wn h( de\ pe/yis e)/oiken ei)=nai sh=yis, w(s *)empedoklh=s marturei= le/gwn oi)=nos u(po\ floiou= pe/letai sape
 e)n cu/lw| u(/dwr h)\ pa/ntwn e(toimo/tato/n e)sti kai\ r(a=|ston ai)tia/sasqai to\ gluku\ tw=n o)mbri/wn kai\ xrhsto/n, e)kpempo/menon
eu)qu\s u(po\ tou= pneu/matos; dio\ kai\ ta\ qre/mmata tou/twn a)polau/ei proqumo/teron, kai\ oi( ba/traxoi prosdokw=ntes o)/mbron e)pilampru/nousi th
 fwnh
 u(po\ xara=s, w(/sper h(/dusma tou= limnai/ou to\ u(e/tion prosdexo/menoi kai\ spe/rma th=s e)kei/nwn gluku/thtos
e(
 ga kai\ tou=to poiei=tai shmei=on u(etou= me/llontos *)/aratos ei)pw/n
h)= ma/la dei/laiai geneai/, u(/droisin o)/neiar,
au)to/qen e)k li/mnhs pate/res boo/wsi guri/nwn.
dia\ ti/ paraba/llousi toi=s qre/mmasin a(/las oi( nomei=s;

po/teron, w(s oi( polloi\ nomi/zousi, plh/qous trofh=s e(/neka kai\ tou= paxu/nein; th/n te ga o)/recin h( drimu/ths e)kkalei=tai kai\ tou\s po/rous a)nastomou=sa ma=llon o(dopoiei= th=| trofh=| pro\s th
 a)na/dosin: dio\ kai\ tou\s i)sxnou\s kai\ tou\s a)tro/fous *)apollw/nios o( *(hrofi/leios e)ke/leue mh\ glukei= mhde\ xondrw=| tre/fein a)lla\ toi=s tarixeutoi=s kai\ u(falmuri/zousin, w(=n h( lepto/ths, w(/sper e)ntri/xwma genome/nh, ta\ siti/a toi=s sw/masi dia\ tw=n po/rwn prosti/qhsin. h)\ ma=llon u(giei/as e(/neka kai\ sugkoph=s plh/qous to
 a(/la lei/xein e)qi/zousi ta\ boskh/mata; nosei= ga a)/gan piaino/mena, th
 de\ pimelh
 th/kousin oi( a(/les kai\ diaxe/ousin o(/qen eu)marw=s kai\ r(a|di/ws a)pode/rousin au)ta\ sfa/cantes: h( ga kollw=sa kai\ sunde/ousa to\ de/rma pimelh\ lepth\ kai\ a)sqenh\s ge/gonen u(po\ th=s drimu/thtos. leptu/netai de\ kai\ to\ ai(=ma tw=n to\ a(/las leixo/ntwn ou)de\ ph/gnutai ta\ e)nto/s, a(lw=n mige/ntwn.
sko/pei de/, mh\ kai\ gonimw/tera kai\ proqumo/tera pro\s ta\s sunousi/as: kai\ ga ai( ku/nes ku/ousi taxe/ws ta/rixos e)pesqi/ousai, kai\ ta\ a(lhga\ tw=n ploi/wn plei/ous tre/fei mu=s dia\ to\ polla/kis sumple/kesqai.
dia\ ti/ tw=n o)mbri/wn u(da/twn eu)alde/stera toi=s spe/rmasi ta\ meta\ brontw=n kai\ a)strapw=n, a(\ dh\ kai\ a)strapai=a kalou=si;

po/teron o(/ti pneumatw/dh dia\ th
 tou= a)e/ros taraxh
 kai\ a)na/micin, to\ de\ pneu=ma th
 u(gro/thta kinou=n ma=llon a)nape/mpei kai\ a)nadi/dwsin h)\ bronta\s me
 kai\ a)strapa\s poiei= to\ qermo
 e)n tw=| a)e/ri pro\s to\ yuxro
 maxo/menon, dio\ xeimw=nos h(\kista bronta=| ma/lista d' e)/aros kai\ fqinopw/rou dia\ th
 a)nwmali/an th=s kra/sews, h( de\ qermo/ths; pe/ptousa
to\ u(gro
 prosfile\s poiei= toi=s blasta/nousi kai\ w)fe/limon: h)\ ma/lista me
 e)/aros bronta=| kai\ a)stra/ptei dia\ th
 ei)rhme/nhn ai)ti/an, ta\ d' e)arina\ tw=n u(da/twn a)nagkaio/tera toi=s spe/rmasi pro\ tou= qe/rous, o(/qen h( plei=ston u(ome/nh tou= e)/aros xw/ra kaqa/per h( e)n *sikeli/a| pollou\s kai\ a)gaqou\s karpou\s a)nadi/dwsin;

dia\ ti/ tw=n xumw=n, o)ktw\ tw=| ge/nei o)/ntwn, e(/na mo/non, to
 a(lmuro/n, a)p' ou)deno\s karpou= gennw/menon o(rw=men; kai/toi kai\ to
 pikro
 h( e)lai/a fe/rei prw=ton kai\ to
 o)cu
 o( bo/trus,: ei)=ta metaba/llwn o( me
 gi/netai liparo\s o( d' oi)nw/dhs: metaba/llei de\ kai\ o( strufno\s e)n tai=s foinikobala/nois kai\ o( au)sthro\s e)n tai=s r(o/ais ei)s to
 gluku/n: e)/niai de\ r(o/ai kai\
mh=la to
 o)cu
 a(plw=s fe/rousin, o( de\ drimu\s e)n tai=s r(i/zais kai\ spe/rmasi polu/s e)sti.

po/teron ou)=n ou)k e)/stin a(lmurou= ge/nesis a)lla\ fqora\ tw=n a)/llwn to\ a(lmuro/n, dio\ kai\ pa=sin a)/trofon toi=s. a)po\ futw=n kai\ sperma/twn trefome/nois, h(/dusma d' e)ni/ois gi/netai tw=| to\ plh/smion a)fairei=n tw=n trefo/ntwn : h)/, kaqa/per th=s qala/tths e(/yontes a)fairou=si to\ a(luko
 kai\ dhktiko/n, e)n toi=s qermoi=s u(po\ qermo/thtos e)camaurou=tai to\ a(lmuro/n: h)\ xumo\s
me/n e)stin, w(s *pla/twn ei)=pen, u(/dwr h)qhme/non dia\ futou=, dihqoume/nh de\ kai\ qa/latta to\ a(lmuro
 a)poba/llei; gew=des ga kai\ paxumere/s e)stin, o(/qen o)ru/ttontes para\ to
 ai)gialo
 e)ntugxa/nousi poti/mois libadi/ois, polloi\ de\ kai\ khri/nois a)ggei/ois a)nalamba/nousin e)k th=s qala/tths u(/dwr gluku\ dihqou/menon, a)pokrinome/nou tou= a(lukou= kai\ gew/dous: h( de\ di' a)rgi/lou prodiagwgh\ panta/pasi th
 qa/lattan dihqoume/nhn po/timon a)podi/dwsi tw=| kate/xein e)n e(auth=| kai\ mh\ diie/nai to\ gew=des. ou(/tw de\ tou/twn e)xo/ntwn, ei)ko/s e)sti ta\ futa\ mh/t' e)/cwqen a)nalamba/nein a(lmuri/da mh/t', a)
 e)n au)toi=s la/bh| ge/nesin, e)kkri/nein ei)s to
 karpo/n: oi( ga po/roi dia\ lepto/thta to\ gew=des kai\ paxumere\s ou) dihqou=sin. h)\ th=s pikro/thtos ei)=dos th
 a(lmuro/thta qete/on, w(s *(/omhros
sto/matos d' e)ce/ptusen a(/lmhn
pikrh/n, h(/ oi( pollo
 a)po\ krato\s kela/ruze ;
kai\ o( *pla/twn fhsi
 a)mfote/rous r(u/ptein kai\ a)poth/kein tou\s xumou/s, h(=tton de\ tau=ta poiei=n to
 a(luko
 kai\ ou) traxu
 ei)=nai: do/cei de\ to\ pikro
 tou= a(lukou= chro/thtos u(perbolh=| diafe/rein, e)pei\
chrantiko/n e)sti kai\ to\ a(luko/n.
dia\ ti/ toi=s sunexw=s dia\ tw=n dedrosisme/nwn de/ndrwn badi/zousi le/pran i)/sxei ta\ yau/onta th=s u(/lhs mo/ria tou= sw/matos;

po/teron, w(s *lai=tos e)/lege, th=| lepto/thti to\ drosw=des u(gro
 a)pocu/ei tou= xrwto/s: h)/, kaqa/per e)rusi/bh toi=s u(grainome/nois e)ggi/gnetai spe/rmasin, ou(/tws u(po\ th=s dro/sou tw=n e)pipolh=s xlwrw=n kai\ a(palw=n a)naxarassome/nwn kai\ a)pothkome/nwn a)/xnh tis a)piou=sa tou= si/nontos a)napi/mplhsi prosxeome/nh toi=s a)naimota/tois me/resi th=s sarko/s, oi(=a knh=mai kai\ po/des, kai\ a)mu/ssei kai\ da/knei th
 e)pifa/neian; o(/ti ga fu/sei ti dhktiko
 e)/nesti th=| dro/sw|, marturei= to\ tou\s pi/onas i)sxnote/rous poiei=n: ai( gou=n pi/ones gunai=kes; i(mati/ois h)\ e)ri/ois a(paloi=s a)nalamba/nousai th=s dro/sou
dokou=si sunth/kein th
 polusarki/an.
dia\ ti/ ta\ ploi=a xeimw=nos e)n toi=s potamoi=s plei= bra/dion, e)n de\ th=| qala/tth| ou) paraplhsi/ws;

po/teron o( pota/mios a)h a)ei\ duski/nhtos w)
 kai\ baru\s e)n de\ xeimw=ni ma=llon paxuno/menos dia\ th

peri/yucin, e)mpodw/n e)sti toi=s ple/ousin : h)\ tou=to ma=llon tou= a)e/ros pa/sxousin oi( potamoi/; e)lau/nousa ga h( yuxro/ths to\ u(/dwr poiei= baru\ kai\ swmatw=des, w(s e)/stin e)n tai=s kleyu/drais katamaqei=n: bra/dion ga e(/lkousi xeimw=nos h)\ qe/rous: e)n de\ *qra/|kh| peri\ to\ *pa/ggaion i(storei= *qeo/frastos ei)=nai krh/nhn, a)f' h(=s tau)to\ ge/mon a)ggei=on u(/datos i(sta/menon xeimw=nos e(/lkein dipla/sion staqmo
 h)\ qe/rous. o(/ti d' h( pukno/ths tou= u(/datos th
 braduth=ta poiei= tou= plou=, dh=lo/n e)sti tw=| plei/ona go/mon fe/rein ta\ pota/mia ploi=a tou= xeimw=nos: to\ ga u(/dwr ma=llon a)nterei/dei pukno/teron kai\ baru/teron gigno/menon, th
 de\ qa/lattan h( qermo/ths kwlu/ei puknou=sqai, di' h(
 ou)de\ ph/gnutai: ma/lkh ga e)/oiken ei)=nai
pu/knwsis.
dia\ ti/, tw=n a)/llwn u(grw=n e)n tw=| kinei=sqai kai\ stre/fesqai yuxome/nwn, th\n qa/lattan o(rw=men e)n tw=| kumatou=sqai qermote/ran gignome/nhn;

h)= tw=n me
 a)/llwn u(grw=n e)peiso/dion ou)=san kai\ a)llotri/an e)ci/sthsin h( ki/nhsis th
 qermo/thta kai\ diaforei=, th
 de\ th=s qala/tths su/mfuton ou)=san e)kripi/zousi ma=llon oi( a)/nemoi kai\ tre/fousi; martu/ria de\ th=s qermo/thtos h( diau/geia kai\ to\ mh\ ph/gnusqai, kai/per ou)=san gew/dh kai\ barei=an.
dia\ ti/ tou= xeimw=nos h(=tton pikra\ gi/gnetai geuome/nois h( qa/latta; tou=to ga/r fasi kai\ *dionu/sion i(storei=n to\n u(dragwgo/n.

h)= o(/ti pantelw=s me
 e)/rhmos ou)k e)/sti gluku/thtos ou)d' a)/moiros h( pikro/ths, a(/te dh\ potamou\s tosou/tous u(podexome/nhs th=s qala/tths: tou= d' h(li/ou to\ gluku\ kai\ po/timon e)cairou=ntos u(po\ koufo/thtos e)pipola/zon kai\ ma=llon e)n tw=| qe/rei tou=to poiou=ntos, e)n de\ tw=| xeimw=ni malakw/teron a(ptome/nou di' a)sqe/neian qermo/thtos, u(poleipome/nh moi=ra pollh=s gluku/thtos a)ni/hsi to\ a)kra/tws pikro
 kai\ farmakw=des; tou=to d' h(suxh= kai\ toi=s poti/mois sumbe/bhke: qe/rous ga ponhro/tera gi/gnetai, to\ koufo/taton kai\ gluku/taton tou= qermou= diaforou=ntos, e)n de\ xeimw=ni ne/on e)pirrei= kai\ pro/sfaton, ou(= mete/xein a)na/gkh kai\ th
 qa/lattan, seiome/nhn a(/ma kai\ tw=n potamw=n e)pidido/ntwn.

po/teron h( qermo/ths bohqei= pro\s th
 peri/yucin,
h)\ au)th\ e)ci/sthsi ma/lista to
 oi)=non a)posbennu/ousa
kai\ fqei/rousa th
 du/namin: h)\ to\ u(datw=des kai\ pneumatw=des tou= oi)/nou pro\s metabolh
 e)pisfale/stat' e)/xon i(/sthsi ta\ gew/dh pefuko/ta stu/fein kai\ katisxnai/nein, oi( d' a(/les meta\ th=s qala/tths leptu/nontes kai\ a)poth/kontes ta/llo/trion kai\ peritto
 ou)k e)w=si duswdi/an ou)de\ sh=yin e)ggi/gnesqai: pro\s de\ tou/tois, o(/son e)sti\ paxu\ kai\ gew=des, e)mpleko/menon toi=s barute/rois kai\ sugkataspw/menon u(posta/qmhn poiei= kai\ tru/ga to
 d' oi)=non a)polei/pei kaqaro/n;
dia\ ti/ ma=llon nautiw=si th\n qa/lattan ple/ontes h)\ tou\s potamou/s, ka)\n e)n galh/nh| ple/wsi;

h)= o(/ti ma/lista nauti/an kinei= tw=n ai)sqh/sewn h( o)/sfrhsis, tw=n de\ paqw=n o( fo/bos; kai\ ga tre/mousi kai\ fri/ttousi kai\ koili/as e)cugrai/nontai fantasi/an kindu/nou labo/ntes: tou/twn d' ou)de/teron e)noxlei= toi=s dia\ potamou= ple/ousin: h( ga o)/sfrhsis panti\ poti/mw| kai\ glukei= sunh/qhs e)sti
 o( de\ plou=s
a)ki/ndunos, e)n de\ th=| qala/tth| th
 t' o)smh
 a)hqei/a| dusxerai/nousi kai\ fobou=ntai, mh\ pisteu/ontes tw=| paro/nti peri\ tou= me/llontos: ou)de
 ou)=n o)/felos th=s galh/nhs, a)lla\ kai\ h( yuxh\ sa/lon e)/xousa kai\ qoruboume/nh sugkinei= kai\ a)napi/mplhsi to\ sw=ma
th=s taraxh=s
dia\ ti/ th=s qala/tths e)lai/w| katarrainome/nhs gi/gnetai katafa/neia kai\ galh/nh;

po/teron, w(s *)aristote/lhs fhsi/, to\ pneu=ma th=s leio/thtos a)polisqa/non ou) poiei= plhgh
 ou)de\ sa/lon:
h)\ tou=to me
 piqanw=s ei)/rhtai pro\s ta\ e)kto/s, e)pei\ de\ fasi kai\ tou\s katakolumbw=ntas, o(/tan e)/laion ei)s to\ sto/ma labo/ntes e)kfush/swsin, e)n tw=| buqw=| fe/ggos i)/sxein kai\ di/oyin, ou)k e)/stin e)kei= pneu/matos o)/lisqon ai)tia/sasqai; sko/pei dh\ mh\ th
 qa/lattan gew/dh kai\ a)nw/malon ou)=san e)cwqei= kai\ diaste/llei th=| pukno/thti tou)/laion, ei)=t' a)natrexou/shs ei)s au(th
 kai\ sustellome/nhs a)polei/pontai po/roi metacu\ tai=s o)/yesi diau/geian kai\ katafa/neian dido/ntes. h)\ fu/sei
me/n e)sti fwteino\s u(po\ qermo/thtos o( th=| qala/tth| katamemigme/nos a)h/r, gi/gnetai de\ taraxqei\s a)nw/malos kai\ skiw/dhs: o(/tan ou)=n th
 a)nwmali/an e)pilea/nh| pukno/thti tou)/laion, a)polamba/nei th
 o(malo/thta kai\ th
 diau/geian;
dia\ ti/ xeimw=nos ma=llon h)\ qe/rous ta\ tw=n a(lie/wn sh/petai di/ktua, kai/toi ta\ g' a)/lla ma=llon e)n tw=| qe/rei tou=to pa/sxei;

po/teron, w(s *qeo/frastos oi)/etai, tw=| yuxrw=| to\ qermo
 u(poxwrou=n a)ntiperii/statai kai\ qermo/tera poiei= ta\ e)n ba/qei th=s qala/tths, w(/sper th=s gh=s: dio\ kai\ ta\ phgai=a tw=n u(da/twn xliarw/tera tou=
xeimw=no/s e)sti kai\ ma=llon a)tmi/zousin ai( li/mnai kai\ oi( potamoi/: kataklei/etai ga ei)s ba/qos h( qermo/ths u(po\ tou= yuxrou= krath/santos: h)\ sh=yis me
 ou)k e)/sti tw=n diktu/wn, o(/tan de\ fri/ch| kai\ pagh=| dia\ to\ yu=xos a)nachraino/mena kai\ qrupto/mena ma=llon u(po\ tou= klu/dwnos sh/yei tini\ kai\ mudh/sei pa/sxei paraplh/sion; kai\ ga ponei= ma=llon e)n kru/ei, kaqa/per ta\ neu=ra sunteino/mena spara/ttetai, pleona/kis e)ktarattome/nhs dia\ to
 xeimw=na th=s qala/tths: dio\ kai\ stu/fousin au)ta\ tai=s bafai=s kai\ puknou=si, fobou/menoi ta\s a)nalu/seis: e)pei\ mh\ bafe/nta mhde\ xrisqe/nta, ma=llon a)
 e)la/nqane tou\s i)xqu=s, e)na/eron ga to\ tou= li/nou xrw=ma kai\ a)pathlo
 e)n qala/tth|.
dia\ ti/ *dwriei=s eu)/xontai kakh\n xo/rtou sugkomidh/n;

h)= kakw=s me

pneu/mata: tau=ta ga ou)k e)a=| puknwqh=nai sunista/menon e)n tw=| sta/xui to

dei=tai ta\ d' a)sqenh= lepth=s kai\ e)lafra=s,: a)sqene/steron d' h( kriqh\ kai\ mano/teron: o(/qen ou) fe/rei th

po/teron, w(s ei)rh/kamen, o( me
 du/natai plei/onos trofh=s katakratei=n h( d' ou) fe/rei to\ polu\ kai\ kataklu/zon, h)\ pukno\s w)

po/teron, w(s toi=s a)/llois to\ a)/rren tou= qh/leos

 me

 au)to\s e)ndi/dwsi tou= pa/qous dei/sas, ta\ de\ ku/ria th=s ai)ti/as e)n a)/llois e)sti/; sko/pei dh/, kat' *)empedokle/a gnou\s o(/ti pa/ntwn ei)si
 a)porroai\ o(/ss' e)ge/nonto:

 e)mploka\s au)tw=n oi( de\ plhga\s oi( d' w)/seis tina\s kai\ periela/seis u(potiqe/menoi. ma/lista de\ tw=n para/lwn petrw=n e)pirrainome/nwn kai\ yhxome/nwn u(po\ th=s qala/tths, a)pie/nai me/rh kai\ qrau/smata polla\ kai\ lepta\ ei)ko\s sunexw=s, a(\ toi=s xrw/masin a)llh/lwn diafe/ronta toi=s me
 a)/llois ou) prosi/sxetai sw/masin a)lla\ lanqa/nei periolisqa/nonta tw=n puknote/rous e)xo/ntwn po/rous h)\ diekqe/onta tw=n manote/rous. o( de\ polu/pous th/n te sa/rka prosidei=n au)to/qen a)nqrhniw/dhs kai\ polu/poros kai\ dektiko\s a)porrow=n e)stin: o(/tan de\ dei/sh|, tw=| pneu/mati trepo/menos kai\ tre/pwn oi(=on e)/sfigce
to\ sw=ma kai\ sunh/gagen, w(/ste prosde/xesqai kai\ ste/gein e)pipolh=s ta\s tw=n e)ggu\s a)porroa/s: kai\ ga h( traxu/ths meta\ th=s malako/thtos e(/likas pare/xousa toi=s e)piferome/nois me/resi mh\ skedannume/nois a)ll' a)qroizome/nois kai\ prosme/nousi, su/gxroun a)perga/zetai th

katanali/skousin ei)s to\ sw=ma pa=san: w(/ste dia\ to\ a)ei\ sunei=nai h)\ mh\ gi/nesqai peri/ttwma , h)\ kai\ to\ suntre/fesqai kai\ sunagela/zesqai ta\ qh/lea toi=s a)/rresin, a)na/mnhsin poiei= tw=n a)frodisi/wn kai\ sunekkalei=tai th

th
 *ai)/tnhn e)n *sikeli/a| fasi\ mhde/na kunhgei=n: polu\ ga a)nafu/esqai kai\ teqhle/nai di' e)/tous i)/on o)reino

dia\ th
 ei)rhme/nhn ai)ti/an; drosobo/loi ga ai( panse/lhnoi: dio\ kai\ th

*dio\s quga/thr e)/rsa tre/fei kai\ di/as *sela/nas: h( ga dro/sos a)sqenh/s e)sti kai\ a)dranh\s o)/mbros, a)sqene\s de\ kai\ to\ th=s selh/nhs qermo/n: o(/qen e(/lkei me

po/teron o(/ti ta\ qhri/a po/rrw tw=n koitw=n o)knou=nta proi+e/nai dia\ to\ kru/os ou) polla\ poiei= shmei=a: dio\ kai/ fasin au)ta\ fei/desqai tw=n plhsi/on, o(/pws mh\
kakopaqh=| planw/mena makra

a)ei\ e)ggu/qen e)/xh| ne/mesqai: h)\ dei= mh\ mo/non e)/xein i)/xnh to

th
 sa/rka tou= e)/xews o)ri/ganon e)pesqi/ei: th

po/teron ou)=n, w(/sper ta\ khri/a th
 me/littan th=|
o)smh=| kai\ ta\ kene/breia to

drimu/thtas h)\ gluku/thtas h)/ tinas a)/llas e)nti/ktousai poio/thtas a)h/qeis kai\ a)to/pous, tw=n u(grw=n trepome/nwn; w(s dh=lo/n e)stin e)pi\ tw=n gunaikw=n, o(/tan ku/wsi, kai\ li/qous kai\ gh=n prosferome/nwn dio\ kai\ tw=n nosou/ntwn tai=s o)re/cesin oi( xari/entes i)atroi\ proi+/sasi tou\s a)sw/tws h)\ swthri/ws e)/xontas: i(storei= gou=n *mnhsi/qeos i)atro\s e)n a)rxh=| pneumoni/as to

de\ kra/seis toi=s pa/qesin e(/pesqai. piqano

dia\ ti/ to\ gleu=kos, a)\n u(po\ yu/xous perie/xhtai to\ a)ggei=on, gluku\ diame/nei polu\n xro/non;

po/teron o(/ti pe/yis e)sti\ tou= gleu/kous h( ei)s to\ oi)nw=des metabolh\ kwlu/ei de\ th
 pe/yin h( yuxro/ths, u(po\ qermou= ga h( pe/yis: h)\ tou)nanti/on, oi)kei=o/s e)sti th=s stafulh=s xumo\s o( gluku/s, dio\ kai\ pepai/nesqai le/getai to\ gluku\ kirnw/menon h( de\ yuxro/ths ou)k e)w=sa diapnei=n a)lla\ sune/xousa to\ qermo/n, th
 gluku/thta diathrei= tou= gleu/kous; au(/th d' e)sti
 ai)ti/a kai\ tw=n trugwme/nwn o)/mbrw| to\ gleu=kos h(=tton a)nazei=n: h( ga ze/sis u(po\ qermo/thtos th
 de\ qermo/thta kate/xei kai\ suste/llei to\ yuxro/n.
dia\ ti/ tw=n qhri/wn h( a)/rktos h(/kista diesqi/ei ta\ di/ktua, kai/toi kai\ lu/koi kai\ a)lw/pekes diesqi/ousi;

po/teron e)ndota/tw tou\s o)do/ntas e)/xousa tou= xa/smatos h(/kista pro\s ta\ li/na e)ciknei=tai, proempi/ptei ga ta\ xei/lh dia\ pa/xos kai\ me/geqos: h)\ ma=llon i)sxu/ousa tai=s xersi\ r(h/gnusi kai\ diaspa=| to
 bro/xon: h)\ kai\ tai=s xersi
 a(/ma xrh=tai kai\ tw=| sto/mati, tai=s me
 diaspw=sa to\ li/non tw=| d' a)munome/nh tou\s diw/kontas; ou)deno\s d' h(=tton au)th=| bohqou=sin ai( perikalindh/seis: dio\ ma=llon h)\ diaspa=n ta\ li/na pragmateuome/nh polla/kis e)kkubista=| kai\ sw/|zetai, a)mh\ kai\ de/oi h( tw=n o)do/ntwn.
ti/s h( ai)ti/a, di' h(\n ta\ yuxra\ tw=n u(da/twn ou) qauma/zomen a)lla\ ta\ qerma/, kai/toi dh=lon o(/ti qermo/ths ai)ti/a tou/twn w(s yuxro/ths e)kei/nwn;

ou) ga, w(s e)/nioi nomi/zousin, h( me
 qermo/ths du/nami/s e)stin h( de\ yuxro/ths ste/rhsis qermo/thtos:
e)pei\ pleio/nwn ai)/tion e)fai/neto to\ mh\ o)

 e)panio
 pa/lin de/xesqai; th=s ga e)n toi=s futoi=s u(gro/thtos h)/nqei kai/ ti tre/fein mhde\ prosti/qesqai mhde\ me/ros ei)=nai tou= fu
Cur inter omnes arbores sola palma contra impositum onus adsurgit?

Utrum quod ignea et spirabilis facultas, qua maxime pollet, quum tentatur
et irritatur, sese exercens magis et magis erigit? An quoniam pondus ramos subito urgens, aerem omnem qui in hi est, oppressum cedere retro cogat, qni deinde resumptis paullo viribus, adversum
onus aerius rursus instat: An molles et tenerae virgae impetum non sustinentes, quum onus quiescit, paullatim se erigunt, et speci:m, quaei contra illud adsurgant, praebent?
Quare aqua de puteis hausta minus alit quam quae de fonte aut caelo manat?

An quia frigidior magis sit et parum quoque aeris habeat: An quod salis multum immixta sibi de terra habeat; sal autem maciem, si quid aliud, facit: An quod pigra nec cursu exercita, qualitatem a. liquam malam
adquirat, quae stirpibus et animantibns contraria, in cansa cst quod nec bene concoquatur nec nutrire quicquam possit: Hinc et stagnantes aquae minus probae cenaentur, quod injuriae quae vel ab aeris mala qualitate vel a terra accipiunt,
digerere nequeant.
Cur Zephyrus ventorum omnium celerrimus vulgo fertur, et Homerus: Nos quoque cum Zephyri curramus flatibus una?

An quod aere perpurgato et minime nebuloso,
fiare soleat? aeris enim densitae et impuritas ventorum cursum non mediocriter impedit. An quod sol radiis suis fiatum frigidum perstringens, quo velocius feratur, auctor est? Ouicquid enim frigidi
ventorum vi contrahitur, id a calore veluti hoste supcratum, longius et citius propelli credendum est.
Cur apes fumum ferre nequeant?

Quod meatus spiritus vitalis sane quam angustos habeant. At is fumo interceptus et conclusus angit et propemodum
ad mortem apes adigit. An acredo amaritudoque fumi in causa eεt: gaudent enim dulcibus apes neqae alio nutrimento uluntur: itaque ut contrariam et noxiam rem propter amaritudinεm, fumum detestantur. Ωua de causa mellarii quum
fumum abigendis apibus faciunt, amaras herbae, ut cicutam et centanrium, incendere solent.
Cur apes citius pungunt qui stuprum dudum fecerunt?

An quod animul estmunditiae et elegantiae perquam studiosum; praeterea olfactus sensu valet
plurimum? Quum itaque impuri congressus propter impudicitiam et immoderatam libidinem soleant esae immundiores: et citius ab apibus deprehenduntur et odium vehementius adversus illos concipiunt. Unde apud Theocritum jocose *wenus ad
Anchisen a paetore ab: egatur, uti apuin aeuleis propter adulterium commisanm pungatur:
Te confer ad Idam,
confer ad Anchisen, ubi quercus atque cypirus
crascit, apum strepit atque domus mellifiua bombis.
Et Pindarus: “Parvula favorum fabricatrix, quae Rhoecum pupugisti aculeo, domans illius perfidiam.”
Cur lupae certo anni tempore omnes intra duodecim dies pariunt?

An quia neque cogitatione comprehendere
quicquam nec reminisci (quibus solus homo virtutibus vulet' potest? itaque quum mente non discernat a quo injuria fuerit illata, id tantum. quod ob oculos minaciter versatur, inimicum eεse existimat deque eo vindictam sumere parat. An lapidem,
dum per terram mittitur, ferarn aliquam esse autumans, pro ingenio hanc prius capere conatur, deinde quum viderit se opinione sua frustrari, hominem rursus invadit? An quod ad id quod missum fuerit, et hominem ipsum aequaliter odit, et id quod
proximius est, insectatur?
Quare canes relicto homine qui jecit, lapidum morsu insectantur?

Antipater in libro de Animalibus partum lu: as projicere adaerit, quum glandiferae arbores fiorem abjiciunt, quo gustato, uteri illarum reserantur: quum ejus copia non eεt, partum
in ipso corpore emori, nec in lucem venire posse: praeterea regiones illas a Iupis non vaetari, quae glandium quercuumque feraces non sunt. Quidam ad fabulam Latonae referunt; quae quum uterum
ferret nec aepiam tuta prae Junone esae posset, duodecim diebus, quibus in Delum proficiscebatur, in lupum a Iove mutata, ut deinceps omnes lupae eo ipso tempore parere possint, impetravit.
Cur aqua in summa parte alba, in fundo vero nigra spectatur?

An quod profunditae nigredinis mater est, ut quae solis radios prius quam ad eam descendant, obtundat et Iabefactet? Superficies autem, quoniam continuo a sole afficitur, candorem luminis recipiat oportet. Quod ipsum et Empedocles
approbat:
et niger in fundo fiuvii color exstat ab umbra,
atque cavernosis itidem spectatur in antris.
An limo p: erumque oppletus fluminum marisque fundus, talem de se colorem per solis refiexum
parit, quali utique is praeditus est? An probabilius est, aquam minime, quae illis est, puram et sinceram esse, sed terrea qualitate (utpote quae continuo, qua currit vel agitatur, aliquid ex ea advehat' imbutam, quum ad fundum residet, turbidiorem et
minus perspicuam efficit?
